rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to generate dynamic XML to show all context in parent record
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to generate dynamic XML to show all context in parent record
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var fileName = system.functions.filename(record);\u000avar key=lib.TaskPlannerUtilities.getUniqueKey(fileName);\u000avar fileId = eval(\"record.\"+key);\u000a\u000avar form = new XML(\"form\");\u000alib.c.$(\"#taskPlannerService\").createFormContext(fileId, fileName, form, null, \"shelltable\")\u000asystem.vars.$parentContext = form.toXMLString();\u000a\u000a//system.vars.$parentContext=lib.c.$(\"#taskPlannerService\").createFormParentFile(record)"}
